casebody.data:
In the Matter of HOYLE & RARICK CLOTHING COMPANY, Bankrupt, Appellant. No. 397. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 8, 1933. Joseph Giller and Archibald Palmer, both of New York City (Sydney Basil Levy and Herbert H. Klein, both of New York City, on the brief), for'appellant. Gregory, Stewart & Montgomery, of New York City (W. Randolph Montgomery, of New York City, of counsel) for Hub Furniture Co.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
